doc.name: moveStack
doc.summary: Sent to the current card when the user moves the stack window.

example.p: set the right of stack Palette to finalLeft - 5
set the top of stack Palette to finalTop

description.overview: Handle the moveStack message if you want to respond to movement of the stack window.

parameters.parameter: The newStackH is the horizontal distance in pixels from the left of the screen to the left edge of the stack.
The newStackV is the vertical distance in pixels from the top of the screen to the top edge of the stack.

description.comments: The moveStack message is sent only if the user moved the stack window. This message is not sent when a handler moves the window by changing its location, rectangle, or other properties.
